features: AdvancedSkin Warm: AdvancedSkin technical fabrics improve body comfort by keeping you dry, warm and protected when you need it and where you need it
DWR treatment: Durable water repellent, or DWR, is a coating added to fabrics at the factory to make them water-resistant(or hydrophobic)

Stormloft: Stormloft insulation technology mimics the structure, loft and warmth of down, with the fast drying, allergy free performance of synthetic. Light weight but exceptionally warm. Stormloft packs small and feels cozy in any weather
